Banner, Rocket, Rogers, and Stark build a time machine.
Recruit an overweight, despondent Thor from the New Asgardian refugee settlement.
Banner convinces the Ancient One to give him the Time Stone after
Banner, Lang, Rogers, and Stark time-travel to New York City during Loki's attack in 2012.
Becomes a vigilante after the erasure of his family.
Location where Loki's attack in 2012 occurred.
Place where Banner convinced the Ancient One to give him the Time Stone.
Location where Rogers retrieved the Mind Stone from Hydra sleeper agents.
Failed attempt by Stark and Lang to steal the Space Stone from its location in Stark Tower.
Location where Rogers traveled back to in 1970.
Earlier version of the Space Stone obtained by Stark at Camp Lehigh in 1970.
Location where Rogers saw his lost love, Peggy Carter.
Location where Rocket extracted the Reality Stone from Jane Foster.
Location where Thor retrieved his old hammer, Mjolnir.
Travel location of Barton and Romanoff in 2014.
Location where Rhodes and Nebula stole the Power Stone before Peter Quill could.
Travel location of Barton and Romanoff in their search for the Soul Stone.
Person who is the keeper of the Soul Stone.

In the present, Nebula (impersonating her future self) uses a time machine to transport Thanos and his warship to the present and destroys the Avengers Compound. However, present-day Nebula convinces 2014-Nebula to betray Thanos, but is unable to convince her future self.
Thanos uses the Stones to destroy the universe and create a new one.
Stark, Banner, and Rocket build a gauntlet to place the Stones into for undoing Thanos's disintegrations.
Banner uses the gauntlet, as he has the most resistance to their radiation, to undo Thanos's disintegrations.
Thor and a Mjolnir-wielding Rogers are overpowered by Thanos.
Stark steals the Stones and uses them to disintegrate Thanos and his army, sacrificing himself.
Thor appoints Valkyrie as the new king of New Asgard.
Rogers returns the Stones and Mjolnir to their proper timelines and remains in the past to live with Carter.
In the present, an elderly Rogers passes his shield to Sam Wilson.
